title: BEAUTIFUL SOUTH BOSTON 1 BED ~NO FEE~
posting_body: Live across from Red Line T stop with easy access to South Station, Downtown Boston, Cambridge, Quincy, I-93, I-90, and tons of great restaurants, bars, shops, and entertainment!
This gorgeous and spacious 1 bed comes with hardwood floors throughout, a beautiful kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, huge fridge, tons of cabinets, and extra pantry space.
High ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, a spacious bedroom, beautiful modern bathroom with tub/shower, central air/heat and in-unit laundry!

Amenities include: roof deck, clubroom, courtyard with BBQ, putting green and bocce court, patio furniture, conference and work from home area, fitness center, on-site maintenance and management, elevators, package concierge, and attached garage*
*some amenity spaces are located in building across the street but are included in rent.
Parking: $300/month enclosed, climate controlled garage with camera monitor and electronic access for additional security.
Breed restrictions apply and monthly pet fee - $60/cat; $100/dog (2 small dogs under $20lbs each for $100 total) except for ESA and Service Animals with proper documentation.
**Rent prices and availability are subject to change**
Contact Dave from Hartley Realty Group for a showing today!
I have knowledge of every luxury rental building in the greater Boston area, and also have access to hundreds of individually owned condos/apartments for rent!

I have listings that are convenient to: Boston, Back Bay, Bay Village, Beacon Hill, The Fenway, Kenmore, Longwood (BIDMC, BCH, DFCI, BW, SRH) Boston Common, Theater District, Financial District, North End, Waterfront, Seaport District, Fort Point, South Boston, South End, West End, MGH, BMC, Chinatown, Leather District, Allston, Brighton, Charlestown, Cambridge, Kendall, MIT, Central Square, Inman Square, Porter Square, Davis Square, Lechmere, Cambridgeside Galleria, Harvard Square, Fresh Pond, Alewife, North Cambridge, Dorchester, Quincy, East Boston, Medford, Somerville, Brookline, Chestnut Hill, Watertown, Waltham, Newton, Red Line, Orange Line, Green Line, Silver Line, Blue Line.
